text: Can you help me with some basic math problems?
Sure thing! What do you need help with?
The result of (9+6)*3 is 45. Is there anything else I can help you with?
Can you help me with calculating the area of a rectangle?
Definitely! What is the length and width of the rectangle?
The length is 5 and the width is 10.
The area of the rectangle is 50 square units.
